description: Unable to login to corporate VPN after password reset
resolution: Clear cached VPN credentials and reconnect

description: Access denied when opening shared finance folder
Laptop not connecting to office WiFi
resolution: Update WiFi drivers and restart router

description: Blue screen error after Windows update
VPN disconnects frequently during remote work
resolution: Update VPN client and check firewall rules
Clear Outlook cache and restart application

description: Mouse not detected after system reboot
Access request pending for HR portal
resolution: Approve access request in admin console
Check drive path and reconnect using correct credentials
Verify LDAP sync and reset password

description: Email not syncing on mobile device
Shared drive missing from File Explorer
User account locked after multiple attempts
Internet extremely slow in office network
resolution: Check bandwidth usage and restart switch

description: VPN works on mobile but not on laptop
Email bounce back error while sending mail
resolution: Check recipient address and mail server logs
Scan for malware and update drivers

description: Unable to connect to remote desktop
resolution: Enable RDP and check firewall port 3389

description: Excel crashing while opening large file
WiFi connected but no internet access

resolution: Check internet connectivity and update server
Flush DNS and clear browser cache
